Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Monica Dunstan
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Mother's Day gift for my mom in Bermuda...My Mom loves it and it works perfectly fine.  :)

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Andreina Camacho
Reviews.Content: I loved this product was everything I expected and more. Definitely would buy again excellent and cheaply. Arrived in good condition and have no regrets

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto, es un teléfono muy rápido con un sistema muy estable.
Reviews.Author: Franklin Marcano
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, es un teléfono muy rápido con un sistema muy estable. Las características que describen garantizan el buen rendimiento del equipo. Puedo decirles que en cuanto a la duración de la batería me he sentido conforme.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Carmen Zapata "LUIS GUARAMATO"
Reviews.Content: the best phone in the world, your screen resolution, the sound, the applications of android phone in excellent generral.  Best of the best.
